game.name: Terminal Colony Deep Core
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 터미널 스타일의 점진적 채굴 게임에서 깊이 파고들고, 노동자를 관리하며, 기술을 연구하고, 양자 미스터리에 맞서세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dig deep, manage workers, research tech, and face quantum mysteries in this terminal style incremental mining game.
